Question
========

On a given hospital ward, over the course of a year, records are kept of how many men and how many women are lying on the first day of the month lie. The numbers for the number of women during that year were:______________. 10 13 12 9 9 11 12 12 10 14 12 10\ For these numbers:

Answerlist
----------

* The median is greater than the mean
* The median and the mean are the same size
* The median is smaller than the mean
* Median and mean are not comparable here

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The median is greater than the mean: Correct
* The median and the mean are the same size: Incorrect
* The median is smaller than the mean: Incorrect
* Median and mean are not comparable here: Incorrect
